meanings.definition: The quality or state of being atypical.
meanings.sent1: Her atypicality in the group made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The atypicality of the situation caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His atypicality in wearing mismatched socks always brings a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The garden's atypicality, with its upside-down trees, was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The atypicality of the purple cow made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The condition of not conforming to the usual type or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The atypicality of the weather this week has been surprising.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her atypicality and stood out from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat's atypicality in meowing like a bird always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: His atypicality in thinking outside the box led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The atypicality of the painting's colors made it unique.
